title: Waymo raises $16 billion to take its robotaxi business ‘global’
full_text:
Waymo raises $16 billion to take its robotaxi business ‘global’. Waymo announced a $16 billion investment round aimed at bringing its robotaxi business to more US cities, as well as some overseas markets. The funding round was led by Dragoneer Investment Group, a "crossover" firm known for investing in late-stage tech comp….
